headline: Congresswoman With Stake In Musk's xAI Adds Position In Tesla's Robot Rival Apptronik

headline: Tutor Perini (TPC) Valuation Check As Optimism Builds Around Forecast Earnings And Revenue Jump
summary: Tutor Perini (TPC) is back on investor radars after recent gains in the stock, as the market reacts to consensus forecasts calling for significantly higher earnings per share and revenue compared with the prior year. See our latest analysis for Tutor Perini. At a share price of $81.73, Tutor Perini has given investors a 38.34% 90 day share price return alongside a very large 1 year total shareholder return of over 7x. This suggests momentum has been building as expectations for higher...
